message.sbutils.autoAdvert.infoWithMinut: Sending advert @ in @ minutes and @ seconds.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.whitelistAddS: Successfully added user @ to the Auto Advert whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.whitelistAddF: User @ is already in the Auto Advert whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.whitelistDelS: Successfully removed user @ from the Auto Advert whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.whitelistDelF: User @ is not in the Auto Advert whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.invalidIndex: An advertisement with that index does not exist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.reset: Reset Auto Advert timer and ad index.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.noAds: Disabling Auto Advert because @ is empty or doesn't exist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.notWhiteliste: Whitelist is enabled but your username is not in the whitelist.
message.sbutils.autoAdvert.notOnSkyblock: You are not currently on Skyblock.
message.sbutils.joinCommands.accountComm: Join commands for the current account:
message.sbutils.joinCommands.invalidInde: A join command with that index does not exist.
message.sbutils.joinCommands.addSuccess: Join command successfully added. Current commands:
message.sbutils.joinCommands.deleteSucce: Join command successfully removed. Current commands:
message.sbutils.mentions.aliasAddSuccess: Mentions will now match the alias @.
message.sbutils.mentions.aliasAddFail: @ is already in the mention alias list.
message.sbutils.mentions.aliasDelSuccess: Mentions will no longer match the alias @.
message.sbutils.mentions.aliasDelFail: @ is not in the mention alias list.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.pleaseWait: Please wait until the current item is finished enchanting.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.cooldown: Enchant All cooldown initiated. Resuming in @ seconds.
message.sbutils.enchantAll.nothingEnchan: You don't have any enchantable items in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoMine.noPickaxe: Disabling Auto Mine because you don't have any pickaxes to switch to, and Auto Fix isn't enabled.
message.sbutils.autoFix.infoWithMinutes: Fixing next item in @ minutes and @ seconds.
message.sbutils.autoFix.currentlyFixing: Auto Fix is currently fixing an item.
message.sbutils.autoFix.waiting: Auto Fix is waiting for an item with a low enough durability.
message.sbutils.autoFix.maxTriesReached: Fix command sent @ times with no response. Disabling Auto Fix.
message.sbutils.toolSaver.actionBlocked: Action blocked due to item durability being too low.
message.sbutils.autoCommand.infoWithMinu: Sending next command in % minutes and % seconds.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.nameAddSucce: Successfully added the name @ to Auto Private.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.nameAddFail: The name @ is already in the Auto Private list.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.nameDelSucce: Successfully removed the name @ from Auto Private.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.nameDelFail: The name @ is not in the Auto Private list.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.noNamesSet: You don't have any Auto Private names set.
message.sbutils.autoPrivate.maxNamesSet: You already have the maximum amount of Auto Private names set.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.invFull: Disabling Auto Silk because your inventory is full.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noLapis: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any lapis in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.notEnoughLapis: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have enough lapis in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noPickaxes: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any pickaxes in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.noBooks: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have any books in your inventory.
message.sbutils.autoSilk.notEnoughExperi: Disabling Auto Silk because you don't have enough experience levels.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.crateTooFar: Disabling Auto Crate because the crate is not within reach.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.inventoryFull: Disabling Auto Crate because your inventory is full.
message.sbutils.autoCrate.closeGui: Disabling Auto Crate because you closed the crate gui.
message.sbutils.staffDetector.noStaff: There are no longer any staff online.
text.sbutils.config.title: sbutils Options
text.sbutils.config.option.messagePrefix: The prefix that appears before sbutils messages. The '@' will be replaced with 'sbutils'.
The color of the sbutils name in messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.prefixColor.t: The color of the characters surrounding 'sbutils' in the message prefix.
text.sbutils.config.option.valueColor.to: The color of values in sbutils messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoAdvert.to: Automatically sends messages from a file.
text.sbutils.config.option.skyblockAdFil: The txt file containing your /skyblock advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.economyAdFile: The txt file containing your /economy advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.classicAdFile: The txt file containing your /classic advertisements.
text.sbutils.config.option.advertInitial: The delay between joining and sending an advert. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.advertUseWhit: Only sends adverts from the account(s) specified in the whitelist.
text.sbutils.config.option.advertWhiteli: A list of accounts that may send adverts if 'Use Advert Whitelist' is enabled.
text.sbutils.config.option.joinCmdInitia: The delay between joining the server and sending the commands.
text.sbutils.config.option.joinCmdServer: A list of servers to send join commands on.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentions.tool: Notifies you with a sound when something is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.excludeServer: Doesn't notify you about server messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.excludeSelfMs: Doesn't notify you about your own messages.
The sound played when something is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentionHighli: Whether to change the color of mentions in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.highlightColo: The color to highlight mentions with.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentionsCurre: Notifies you when your username is mentioned in chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.mentionsAlias: A list of strings you would like to be notified for.
The delay between sending enchant commands. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.cooldownFrequ: The number of commands to be executed before a cooldown is initiated. (To avoid spam kick)
text.sbutils.config.option.addPrefix.too: Adds the specified prefix to all the messages you send.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatPrefix.to: The prefix to add to your messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.addSuffix.too: Adds the specified suffix to all the messages you send.
text.sbutils.config.option.chatSuffix.to: The suffix to add to your messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.tipsFilterEna: Whether tip messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.advancementsF: Whether advancement messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.welcomeFilter: Whether player welcome messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.friendJoinFil: Whether friend join messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.motdFilterEna: Whether island MOTD messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.voteFilterEna: Whether player vote messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.voteRewardFil: Whether player vote reward messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.lotteryFilter: Whether lottery messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.cratesFilterE: Whether crate opening messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.clearLagFilte: Whether ClearLag messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.perishedInVoi: Whether 'perished in void' messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.skyChatFilter: Whether SkyChat messages should be filtered from chat.
text.sbutils.config.option.shopLoggerInc: Whether to log transaction messages from your shops.
text.sbutils.config.option.shopLoggerOut: Whether to log transaction messages from other players' shops.
text.sbutils.config.option.msgLoggerInco: Whether to log incoming private messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.msgLoggerOutg: Whether to log outgoing private messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.visitLogger.t: Whether to log players visiting your island.
text.sbutils.config.option.dpLogger.tool: Whether to log messages from drop party events.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSwitch.to: Automatically switches to a new pickaxe when the current durability gets too low.
text.sbutils.config.option.switchDurabil: The durability to switch to a new pickaxe at.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoFix.toolt: Automatically fixes the most damaged items in your inventory over time.
text.sbutils.config.option.maxFixPercent: The maximum durability percentage an item can have and be fixed.
text.sbutils.config.option.fixRetryDelay: How long to wait for a response before sending the fix command again.
text.sbutils.config.option.maxFixRetries: The maximum amount of times to retry the fix command if the server isn't responding.
text.sbutils.config.option.toolSaver.too: Prevents usage of tools after a certain durability.
text.sbutils.config.option.antiPlaceHead: Prevents the placement of heads that have custom names.
text.sbutils.config.option.antiPlaceGras: Prevents the placement of grass blocks.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoCommandEn: Repeatedly executes a command with a set delay.
The response to send to private messages.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoReplyDela: The delay between responses if multiple people message you at once. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoLottery.t: Automatically buys lottery tickets when you log in and when the lottery ends.
text.sbutils.config.option.lotteryTicket: The amount of lottery tickets to purchase. (Max. 2)
text.sbutils.config.option.grassCheckDel: If you don't have enough grass in your inventory, how often it should check for more. (Seconds)
text.sbutils.config.option.autoPrivateNa: Up to two names to put on private signs. Yours is included automatically.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilk.tool: Automatically enchants books and diamond pickaxes with Silk Touch.
text.sbutils.config.option.autoSilkDelay: The delay between each enchanting action.
text.sbutils.config.option.crateMode.too: The type of crate to target.
text.sbutils.config.option.crateDelay.to: After the current crate finishes, how long to wait before opening the next.
text.sbutils.config.option.crateDistance: The maximum distance from the crate.
text.sbutils.config.option.detectStaffJo: Whether you should receive notifications when staff members join.
text.sbutils.config.option.detectStaffLe: Whether you should receive notifications when staff members leave.
text.sbutils.config.option.playStaffSoun: Whether to play sounds when staff members join/leave.
text.sbutils.config.option.staffDetectSo: The sound played when staff join/leave.
